name: howtogetrid offleasez
short_description:
I am Robert Griffin, I have already been an expert pet groomer for around two decades, and have had my fair share of having to deal with fleas. I helped produce this website along with the content to share my wealth of knowledge about flea control so that others might uncover a little relief from the bothersome insects. 

Howtogetridoffleasez.com had been introduced in 2012 to offer the definitive resource on the internet for flea control information. The website is based upon the idea that one must stick to a specific number of steps, as well as maintain a regular program of flea control, to become effective in the long run. 

Please keep in mind that our web site is designed for informational purposes only. It's a very useful resource, but it's not intended to be professional veterinarian advice. Make sure you speak to your veterinarian just before making use of any flea control products, especially those which include insecticides or any other toxic substances.
